text: Anyone ever have this happen? This is my dev portal for all my testing stuff

All, looking for some help with Form Submission limit issue'.

We have used this form submission API on one of the forms from our HubSpot portal. We did all the testing and took it live last night. But now this form is not collecting/recording any new data. And it says this error below,

"Contacts are limited to 1,000 form submissions. As the contact has reached this limit, their submission won’t show up on their contact record and they won't be enrolled in workflows based on this form."

We have already deleted the test contact records from Contact Database. but still shows this error.,

Any help?
Hey Bradley, can you DM me your portal ID that this is on? We have recently added some additional security around our developer portals.

Hi guys, how do I style a form on a standalone form page? I can only find information on how to style and embedded form on an external page or a form module. I need to style it using my external CSS, not the color picker/font size etc under the style tab.
Hi guys, I am new to HubSpot. I am trying to create onclick popup form in HubSpot. I need help how to create onclick popup.

Thank you! I have made some technical perfromance gains by changing some simple things-- file sizes, JS blocking, etc. I ran our "Google Page Insights" Mobile results-- we're seeing an improvement from 24 to 79 in one day. I believe with a few more days I can leverage a higher number.

I think the logical fallacy my team is making here is making here is relying too much on Google's site speed metrics as an end all be all solution for SEO performance. I certainly think the HubSpot ecosystem is generally more secure than Wordpress at large.

Thank you for your insight-- I'm an at an impass w/ my team here and am trying to keep everyone calm and collected as I try to keep us on HubSpot.

Hey all, i am new in HubSpot and coming from wordpress. is there anything like custom post types in HubSpot? how can i organize my posts? for an example cars posts, trucks etc... and have a different layout for the specific post types. i can't find anyting simular.. any ideas???
